Name: Lolita Margarita
Ingredients: 20 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
History: Named after the novel by Vladimir Nabokov which chronicles a middle-aged man's infatuation with a 12-year-old girl. Nabokov invented the word 'nymphet' to describe her seductive qualities. Margarita cocktail history
Nutrition: One serving of Lolita Margarita contains 184 calories
